title: build: make.bat does not exit 1 on failure
body:
make.bat does not respect GOBUILDEXIT env var, and does not exit with proper error
status.
Perf dashboard uses make.bat to build, this causes dashboard to produce unhelpful error
messages like:
http://goperfd.appspot.com/log/760df729dd6d4cf9097b3677e23fcb6dda6d2488
